Metadata.title: Reyes Rondón Portfolio - Web Developer and Programmer.
Metadata.description: Reyes Rondón Portfolio - Web Developer and Programmer.

Intro.text: I have more than 4 years of experience developing and maintaining web applications with React, PHP, MySQL and WordPress.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.text: I adapted and created plugins using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, MySQL and PHP, and led a team of developers to meet project deadlines.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.shortner_text: Quick and easy link shortening application with tracking of the number of times the shortened link is used.

About.title: About me
About.text: Computer engineer with more than 4 years of experience developing and maintaining web applications with React, PHP, MySQL and WordPress, from personal brands to online stores. I have deep knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, React, TypeScript and web design. Recently, I worked at Wordpress Hilfe & Support Berlin, where I created more than 30 websites.
